entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind south 30 km/h. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
